      • getOAuthClients

        @GetMapping(value="/oauth-clients")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<ClientDetailsDTO>> getOAuthClients()
                                                                                                                                      throws org.radarcns.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        GET /api/oauth-clients.

        Retrieve a list of currently registered OAuth clients.

        Returns:
        the list of registered clients as a list of ClientDetailsDTO
        Throws:
        org.radarcns.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • getOAuthClientById

        @GetMapping(value="/oauth-clients/{id:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ClientDetailsDTO> getOAuthClientById(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String id)
                                                                                                                                                    throws org.radarcns.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        GET /api/oauth-clients/:id.

        Get details on a specific client.

        Parameters:
        id - the client id for which to fetch the details
        Returns:
        the client as a ClientDetailsDTO
        Throws:
        org.radarcns.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • createOAuthClient

        @PostMapping(value="/oauth-clients")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ClientDetailsDTO> createOAuthClient(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                ClientDetailsDTO clientDetailsDto)
                                                                                                                         throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                                org.radarcns.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        POST /api/oauth-clients.

        Register a new oauth client.

        Parameters:
        clientDetailsDto - The OAuth client to be registered
        Returns:
        a response indicating success or failure
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if there was a problem formatting the URI to the new entity

      • getRefreshToken

        @GetMapping(value="/oauth-clients/pair")
 @Timed
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ClientPairInfoDTO> getRefreshToken(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String login,
                                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="clientId")
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String clientId)
                                                                                                                            throws org.radarcns.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException,
                                                                                                                                   java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                                   java.net.MalformedURLException
        GET /oauth-clients/pair.

        Generates OAuth2 refresh tokens for the given user, to be used to bootstrap the authentication of client apps. This will generate a refresh token which can be used at the /oauth/token endpoint to get a new access token and refresh token.

        Parameters:
        login - the login of the subject for whom to generate pairing information
        clientId - the OAuth client id
        Returns:
        a ClientPairInfoDTO with status 200 (OK)
        Throws:
        org.radarcns.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
